<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt">风前辈对令狐冲的性情大为欣赏，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">决定指点指点他：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> “</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt">如今江湖流行面向对象这门绝技，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">你好好修炼一下吧，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:

color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt">看看这本书，</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt">一个月以后来见我。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt">

"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

mso-bidi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#2F2F2F;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
